# CATransform3DIsIdentity(_:)

**Function**

Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the transform is the identity transform.

## Declaration

```swift
func CATransform3DIsIdentity(_ t: CATransform3D) -> Bool
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if `t` is the identity transform, otherwise [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Determining Transform Properties

- **CATransform3DIsAffine(_:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether a transform can be exactly represented by an affine transform.
- **CATransform3DEqualToTransform(_:_:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the two transforms are exactly equal.
